      • setProfile

        public MapboxDirections.Builder setProfile(java.lang.String profile)
        Specify what routing profile you'd like: driving, walking, or cycling.
        Parameters:
        profile - DirectionsCriteria.PROFILE_DRIVING, DirectionsCriteria.PROFILE_CYCLING, or DirectionsCriteria.PROFILE_WALKING

      • setWaypoints

        public MapboxDirections.Builder setWaypoints(java.util.List<Waypoint> waypoints)
        If you have more then one destination, call this method passing in a list of all waypoints including origin and final destination.
        Parameters:
        waypoints - List including all Waypoint you'd line to include in route.

      • setOrigin

        Parameters:
        origin - Waypoint of origin.

      • setDestination

        public MapboxDirections.Builder setDestination(Waypoint destination)
        Final destination of your route, call this only if you have one destination, otherwise, use setWaypoints(List)
        Parameters:
        destination - Waypoint of destination.

      • setAlternatives

        public MapboxDirections.Builder setAlternatives(java.lang.Boolean alternatives)
        Optionally, call if you'd like to receive alternative routes besides just one.
        Parameters:
        alternatives - true if you'd like alternative routes, else false.

      • setInstructions

        public MapboxDirections.Builder setInstructions(java.lang.String instructions)
        Optionally, call if you'd like to receive human-readable instructions.
        Parameters:
        instructions - DirectionsCriteria.INSTRUCTIONS_TEXT or DirectionsCriteria.INSTRUCTIONS_HTML

      • setGeometry

        public MapboxDirections.Builder setGeometry(java.lang.String geometry)
        Optionally, call with the format you'd like the route geometry to be in.
        Parameters:
        geometry - DirectionsCriteria.GEOMETRY_GEOJSON, DirectionsCriteria.GEOMETRY_POLYLINE, or DirectionsCriteria.GEOMETRY_FALSE

      • setSteps

        public MapboxDirections.Builder setSteps(java.lang.Boolean steps)
        Optionally, call if you'd like to include step information within route.
        Parameters:
        steps - true if you'd like step information.
